### Birthday problem

```{python}

```

```{python}
k = 4
numerators = np.arange(364, 365-k, -1)
numerators
```

```{python}
np.prod(numerators/365)
```

```{python}
k = 40
numerators = np.arange(364, 365-k, -1)
np.prod(numerators/365)
```

```{python}
ten = np.arange(1, 9)
np.cumprod(ten)
```

```{python}
k = 60
numerators = np.arange(364, 365-k, -1)
```
